gnu.lists
Interface PositionContainer

All Known Implementing Classes:
SeqPosition, SubSequence, TreePositionList
public interface PositionContainer

An object that contains some number of positions in a Sequence. Each position is a pair of an int and an Object. These have meaning only as interpreted by the Sequence. This interface is purely for efficiency - rather than allocating a fresh SeqPosition object for each pair, we can store more than one pair in a container.
